qrList.label: Info
qrList.message: /sendas name="Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response"

qrList.label: Tarot
qrList.message:
Hello Madame, I have done a reading, and I would like some help to interpret the cards. Although I have not done a specific layout, I did ask a question when shuffling.

The reading is based on a yes or no format where two upright cards mean a 'Yes' (then explained in the context of the cards), two reverse cards mean a 'No' (then explained in the context of the cards), and one upright with one reversed means 'Uncertain' (look at the context of the cards to determine why the question is not definitively answered).

Here is the question I have asked:

qrList.label: HoraryCht
qrList.message:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: ###

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

qrList.label: EventCht
qrList.message:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: #

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant in this chart, and I should be represented by his 9th house (foreign connection).

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

qrList.label: HoryRelatn
qrList.message:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: ###

Please note that this reading requires 100% accuracy and honesty in interpretation, regardless of whether the aspects reveal positive or negative energies. The chart must be read exactly as it presents itself, without bias in either direction. If the aspects show negativity, that negativity will be revealed fully. If the aspects show positivity, that positivity will be revealed fully. There shall be no softening of negative aspects, nor any dampening of positive ones. The only acceptable outcome is to interpret precisely what the chart demonstrates through its aspects, houses, and planetary positions - be that wonderful, terrible, or anywhere in between. Complete accuracy to the chart's true message is the sole priority.

Also, please do not immediately assume that I'm looking for romantic inclinations. I am not certain what, if any, feelings exist, and what those feelings are deemed to be. That is the reason I have drawn up the chart, is to get a true determination. So, any biasing towards romantic inclination or otherwise should be removed, and ensure that this chart is interpreted fully and objectively to discern the true nature of the questied's feelings, thoughts, and intentions.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

qrList.label: bkGnd
qrList.message:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

qrList.label: AdCtx
qrList.message:
Thank you, Madame. Now that you've done the reading objectively, I'd like to give you some more context. I'm providing you with a case file with everything that I know about Stefan, as well as my personal account and communication history between him and I.

 Can you please reinterpret the chart now that you have this extra context?

qrList.label: Procd
qrList.message: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.
